RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH: Possui doutorado em Engenharia Aeronсutica e Mecтnica na сrea de Produчуo pelo ITA (2015), mestrado em Engenharia Aeronсutica e Mecтnica na сrea de Produчуo pelo ITA (2010), MBA em Gestуo e Economia Empresarial pela UFRJ (2003), especializaчуo em Administraчуo Industrial pela USP/FCAV (2002) e graduaчуo em Engenharia Mecтnica pela UMC (1992). Atualmente щ Professor Doutor no Departamento de Engenharia de Produчуo/ Mecтnica na Facens (Associaчуo Cultural de Renovaчуo Tecnolѓgica Sorocabana) e Gerente Geral na Federal-Mogul Sistemas Automotivos. Tem experiъncia na сrea de Administraчуo Empresarial e Industrial , Engenharia de Produчуo, com ъnfase em Planejamento e Gestуo de Sistemas Produчуo, atuando principalmente nos seguintes temas: Manufatura Enxuta, Gestуo da Produчуo, Gestуo da Cadeia de Suprimentos, Seis Sigmas, Seguranчa do Trabalho, Meio Ambiente, Sustentabilidade e Recursos Humanos.
RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH-EN: Holds a doctorate degree in Aeronautical Engineering and Mechanical in the Production area by the ITA (2015), master's degree in Aeronautical Engineering and Mechanical in the Production area by the ITA (2010), MBA in Management and Business Economics by the UFRJ (2003), specialization in Industrial Administration by the USP / FCAV (2002) and a degree in Mechanical Engineering by the UMC (1992). He is currently Professor Doctor in the Department of Production/ Mechanics Engineering at Facens and General Manager at Federal-Mogul Automotive Systems. He has experience in Business Administration and Industrial Production Engineering, with emphasis in Planning and Production Management Systems, acting on the following topics: Lean Manufacturing, Production Management, Supply Chain Management, Six Sigma, Safety, Environment, Sustainability and Human Resources.

LINHA-DE-PESQUISA.TITULO-DA-LINHA-DE-PESQUISA: Pesquisa de sistemas de gestуo de produчуo fundamentado nos princэpios da manufatura enxuta, sustentabilidade e transformaчуo cultural

PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.NOME-DO-PROJETO: Desenvolvimento de um modelo de gestуo da produчуo integrando os princэpios da manufatura enxuta e da sustentabilidade suportado pela transformaчуo cultural da organizaчуo.
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO: Este projeto investiga um modelo de gestуo da produчуo e seu mщtodo de implementaчуo integrando os princэpios da manufatura enxuta e da sustentabilidade suportado pela transformaчуo cultural da organizaчуo. A Manufatura Enxuta щ um sistema de combate aos desperdэcios no ambiente produtivo, alcanчando reduчуo dos estoques em processamento e uma consequente reduчуo do tempo de ciclo total de produчуo, tornando a empresa mais competitiva e com melhora o tempo de resposta no atendimento aos seus clientes. O desenvolvimento sustentсvel compreendidos pelo conceito do Triple Bottom Line, relativo ao equilэbrio entre o resultado operacional, o respeito рs pessoas e a preservaчуo do meio ambiente, proporcionam as empresas, que os incorporam corretamente, uma manufatura saudсvel resultante do uso racional de insumos e recursos naturais e uma vantagem competitiva para atuar em mercados de difэcil penetraчуo. A implementaчуo eficaz de um sistema de gestуo baseado nos princэpios da Manufatura Enxuta e da Sustentabilidade impacta toda a organizaчуo, demandando mudanчas de processo, na forma de gestуo e principalmente de comportamento das pessoas e equipes de trabalho. Resistъncia рs mudanчas щ muito comum quando se implanta algo novo, pois tende a tirar as pessoas da zona de conforto, causa inseguranчa, medo e execuчуo de tarefas de modo diferente exigindo um aprendizado novo para atividades que estavam acostumados a fazer de uma certa maneira. Agregar no escopo de implementaчуo de um projeto elementos de gerenciamento da cultura organizacional e de desenvolvimento de pessoas щ crucial para vencer as resistъncias e avanчar de modo sustentсvel, trazendo confianчa aos impactados e aderъncia ao novo mщtodo de trabalho. A proposta do modelo e seu mщtodo de implementaчуo se fundamenta em investigaчѕes na literatura e em uma aplicaчуo do modelo em uma empresa do segmento automotivo.
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO-INGLES: This project investigates a model of production management system and its implementation method incorporating the principles of lean manufacturing and sustainability supported by the cultural transformation of the organization. Lean Manufacturing is a system for waste elimination in the production environment, reaching inventory in process reduction and a reduction in total cycle time of production, making the company more competitive and providing a better response time to customers. Sustainable development approaches the concept of the Triple Bottom Line, balancing the operating result, respect for people and the preservation of the environment, providing to companies that incorporate them properly, a healthy manufacturing resulting from the rational use of inputs and natural resources and a competitive advantage to operate in markets with difficult penetration. The effective implementation of a management system based on the principles of Lean Manufacturing and Sustainability impacts the entire organization, demanding process changes, management slyle and mainly on the behavior of people and work teams. Resistance to changes is very common when you deploy something new, since it tends to get people out of their comfort zone, causes insecurity, fears and demand tasks and activities performed differently requiring new learning. Add in the scope of implementation of project management elements of organizational culture and development of people is crucial to overcome resistance and move forward in a sustainable manner, in order to bring confidence to the affected people and adherence to the new working method. The proposed model and its implementation method are based on research literature and an application of the model in a company from the automotive sector.
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.NOME-DO-PROJETO-INGLES: Desenvolvimento de um modelo de gestуo da produчуo integrando os princэpios da manufatura enxuta e da sustentabilidade suportado pela transformaчуo cultural da organizaчуo.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO: Definiчуo de localidade para instalaчуo industrial com o apoio do mщtodo de anсlise hierсrquica (AHP)
DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO-INGLES: Definiчуo de localidade para instalaчуo industrial com o apoio do mщtodo de anсlise hierсrquica (AHP)

SETORES-DE-ATIVIDADE.SETOR-DE-ATIVIDADE-3: Fabricaчуo de veэculos automotores, reboques e carrocerias

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: RESUMO: Esse artigo apresenta a uma anсlise de fatores relevantes para auxiliar a tomada de decisуo na escolha de uma localidade geogrсfica ideal para a instalaчуo de uma unidade fabril de uma empresa do segmento automotivo. O modelo estudado teve como motivaчуo para o seu desenvolvimento, a necessidade da empresa em expandir suas linhas de produчуo para uma outra localidade, em virtude da impossibilidade de expansуo de suas instalaчѕes vigente por limitaчѕes fэsicas de espaчo, aliado a busca de vantagens competitivas como decorrъncia da mudanчa de local. Nesse contexto, a sistemсtica baseada na aplicaчуo da metodologia de anсlise multicritщrio (AHP) foi aplicada, resultando na indicaчуo da melhor alternativa de localidade para a instalaчуo da nova fсbrica, em funчуo dos critщrios previamente estabelecidos.
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: ABSTRACT: This paper presents an analysis of relevant factors to assist decision making in choosing an ideal geographic location for a site installation of a manufacturing company in the automotive industry. The model studied had its development motivated by the company needs to expand its production lines to another location due to inability to expand the existing site caused by physical limitations of space, coupled with the pursuit of competitive advantages as a result of change location. In this context, the systematic application based on multi criteria analysis methodology (AHP) was applied, resulting in an indication of the best location alternative for the new facility installation, according to the criteria previously established.

SETORES-DE-ATIVIDADE.SETOR-DE-ATIVIDADE-2: Fabricaчуo de mсquinas, aparelhos e materiais elщtricos

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: ABSTRACT: The search for superior production performance has been used by companies to overcome competition in the current global economic scenario. Efficient manufacturing connected to environmental initiatives provides a company with favourable conditions for maintaining uniform and continuous improvement in its competitive performance, while providing operational versatility to respond quickly to volatile markets. As production is one of the most expensive areas for a company, many organizations have sought a new management model for their production system that provides substantial productivity gains, cost saving opportunities and higher customer satisfaction. This study proposes a model of production management and an implementation method integrating the principles of lean manufacturing and sustainability, supported by cultural transformation at the company. Its objective is to achieve productivity gains and improvements on customer satisfaction, as well as develop the ability to provide quick responses to market changes in a globalized economy. The implementation of the proposed model should be gradual, initially addressing fundamental principles, and should operate simultaneously with, and in the same environment as, workforce development and organizational transformation initiatives, to create sustainable improvements.
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: ABSTRACT: The search for superior production performance has been used by companies to overcome competition in the current global economic scenario. Efficient manufacturing connected to environmental initiatives provides a company with favourable conditions for maintaining uniform and continuous improvement in its competitive performance, while providing operational versatility to respond quickly to volatile markets. As production is one of the most expensive areas for a company, many organizations have sought a new management model for their production system that provides substantial productivity gains, cost saving opportunities and higher customer satisfaction. This study proposes a model of production management and an implementation method integrating the principles of lean manufacturing and sustainability, supported by cultural transformation at the company. Its objective is to achieve productivity gains and improvements on customer satisfaction, as well as develop the ability to provide quick responses to market changes in a globalized economy. The implementation of the proposed model should be gradual, initially addressing fundamental principles, and should operate simultaneously with, and in the same environment as, workforce development and organizational transformation initiatives, to create sustainable improvements.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO-INGLES: Shortening of lead time of importation of materials with the aid of value streaming mapping

SETORES-DE-ATIVIDADE.SETOR-DE-ATIVIDADE-1: Fabricaчуo de veэculos automotores, reboques e carrocerias

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: RESUMO: Este artigo apresenta as melhoras resultantes da aplicaчуo do mapeamento do fluxo de valor no processo de importaчуo de componentes por uma empresa do setor automotivo. O objetivo foi de analisar em detalhes as etapas que compѕe o processo de importaчуo identificando os tempos de cada uma delas e otimizando os gargalos com a reduчуo dos tempos de valor nуo-agregado. Uma pesquisa bibliogrсfica foi desenvolvida a partir da anсlise de livros, de artigos e de periѓdicos para a obtenчуo do embasamento teѓrico da ferramenta utilizada, cuja aplicaчуo resultou numa reduчуo significativa no tempo total e inventсrio em trтnsito dos materiais.
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: ABSTRACT: This article presents the improvements resulting with the application of value stream mapping on the process of importing components for an automotive company. The objective was to examine in detail all steps that make up the import process by identifying the times of each step and optimizing its bottlenecks by reducing the respective times of non-value added. A literature search was developed from the analysis of books, articles and journals to obtain the tool theoretical basement, which application resulted in significant reduction in total transit time and on materials inventory as well.
